# Animations

## Protestor

totalframes for animation (example: 40) 30x30 pixels

40 player run
10 player duck
10 player hop

25 player stumble light/dog 
20 player stumble heavy

15 player fall clothesline
20 player fail trip

#### see `"dist/assets/images/protester_04_xyz.png"`
